attributes.action:
Bromley Housing rents!
Short full of £300 per month on all  properties.
attributes.additional_details:
I am a Landlord and I do not like what my tenants are going through. 
It is very unfair, they are getting avery bad hand from the Goverment.
They can't live in Bromly because they are not given enough rent by the Goverment. Because the Goverment have frozen rents for many years.
They are all now under valued,
attributes.background:
Bromley Housing rents  used to be calculated on the average lowest 30% property rents.
Now there is a short full of £300 per month on 1, 2, 3. 4. bedroom properties.  

The Housing rents are not calculated correctly anymore!

rejection.details:
We can’t accept petitions that request action at a local level, but we have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Require Local Housing Allowance rates be increased in line with inflation: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/636623
